text: Ashanti (also called Ashanti, Land of No Mercy) is a 1979 Swiss American action adventure movie directed by Richard Fleischer and was based the 1974 novel Ébano by Alberto Vázquez-Figueroa. It stars Michael Caine, Peter Ustinov, Kabir Bedi, Beverly Johnson, Omar Sharif, Rex Harrison, William Holden, Zia Mohyeddin, Jean-Luc Bideau and Tariq Yunus and was distributed by Warner Bros. in North America and Columbia Pictures internationally. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 action movies Category:1979 adventure movies Category:Swiss action movies Category:Swiss adventure movies Category:1970s American action movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Fleischer Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies about prostitution Category:American drama thriller movies Category:Movies about slavery Category:1979 thriller movies Category:1979 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:Mystery drama movies Category:Mystery thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies
title: Ashanti (1979 movie)
